formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: A DOMAIN ERROR in ConvPrims[2] occurs with the following message.

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: When pm⌿⍵ is an empty AST, then 'name'Prop pm⌿⍵ will be an empty list, which is a domain error for a catenation reduction. Instead, we can put an initial seed value to ensure that the reduction contains at least one value. In this case the seed is (,'') which must be attached as the first or last element in the vector.
